title: India’s housing prices rise 7.7% annually, ranks 15th globally in Q1
summary: India's housing market demonstrates robust growth, securing 15th position globally with a 7.7% nominal price increase in Q1 2025. Strong domestic demand, rising incomes, and investor confidence fuel this positive momentum.
fullContent: India's housing market demonstrates robust growth, securing 15th position globally with a 7.7% nominal price increase in Q1 2025. Strong domestic demand, rising incomes, and investor confidence fuel this positive momentum. Experts anticipate continued resilience throughout 2025, driven by economic expansion and stable interest rates.
